description.0: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

0.0: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by <cryo>0.12%</cryo>. A maximum of <cryo>40%</cryo> increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

1.0: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by <cryo>0.15%</cryo>. A maximum of <cryo>50%</cryo> increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

2.0: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by <cryo>0.18%</cryo>. A maximum of <cryo>60%</cryo> increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

3.0: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by <cryo>0.21%</cryo>. A maximum of <cryo>70%</cryo> increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

4.0: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by <cryo>0.24%</cryo>. A maximum of <cryo>80%</cryo> increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.
